item.description:
Our Steppin' Weekend has been extended to another evening. An opportunity to practice what you've learned following the workshop which is important for retention.

The Hostess (Muffen) from Martini Mondays was at Max's Saturday night. She had a wonderful time and even stepped.

She has extended another invitation to The Original Steppers of Boston, Inc 2006 for Monday night, July 12th.

I know some of us have been steppin' hard since Thursday evening, however those that still want to get their step on, the opportunity is here.

The X & O's Ultra Lounge is still here!

Come on down after work this Monday to get your step on, get your practice on, from 7:30pm-10pm

We've made arrangements to control the music and to have the dance floor cleared and ready for us Steppers.


The best martinis, great food, shoot pool, or just chill.

This is a private event for TOSOB members only.

The X & O's Ultra Lounge
217 Washington St
Stoughton, MA 02072
781-344-1800

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppin' @ X & O Ultra Lounge
